titles.title: Accelerating Networking, Cyberinfrastructure, and Hardware for Oceanic Research Act
ANCHOR Act
Accelerating Networking, Cyberinfrastructure, and Hardware for Oceanic Research Act
ANCHOR Act
Accelerating Networking, Cyberinfrastructure, and Hardware for Oceanic Research Act
ANCHOR Act
ANCHOR Act
A bill to require a plan to improve the cybersecurity and telecommunications of the U.S. Academic Research Fleet, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.
Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.
Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation. Reported by Senator Cruz with an amendment in the nature of a substitute. With written report No. 119-64.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 169.

vote.text: Passed Senate with an amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

committee.name: Senate Commerce, Science, and Transportation
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Referred To
